attributes.action: Include gyms on the list of essential places to stay open during the lockdown
attributes.additional_details: During the 2020 national lockdown at the start of the year, leisure centers were shut for nearly 4 months which meant people were unable to look after their physical and mental wellbeing. Leisure centres and gyms are part of a healthy person's routine and are considered essential to a lot of peoples mental wellbeing
attributes.background: Keep gyms on the essential list of places to remain open during the Covid 19 pandemic. Gyms are needed for not just physical wellbeing but also mental wellbeing.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

The Committee will be holding a debate on Covid-19 restrictions on gyms and sport on Monday 23 November. You will be able to watch the debate on Parliament TV at 4.30pm: https://www.parliamentlive.tv/Commons
